fields.name: CurrentProtectionState
fields.description: Specifies the current protection state of the resource

fields.name: DataSourceInfo
fields.description: Gets or sets the data source information.

fields.name: DataSourceSetInfo
fields.description: Gets or sets the data source set information.

fields.name: DatasourceAuthCredentials
fields.description: Credentials to use to authenticate with data source provider.

fields.name: FriendlyName
fields.description: Gets or sets the Backup Instance friendly name.

fields.name: IdentityDetails
fields.description:
Contains information of the Identity Details for the BI.
If it is null, default will be considered as System Assigned.

fields.name: PolicyInfo
fields.description: Gets or sets the policy information.

fields.name: ProtectionErrorDetails
fields.description: Specifies the protection error of the resource

fields.name: ProtectionStatus
fields.description: Specifies the protection status of the resource

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Specifies the provisioning state of the resource i.e. provisioning/updating/Succeeded/Failed

fields.name: ValidationType
fields.description: Specifies the type of validation. In case of DeepValidation, all validations from /validateForBackup API will run again.
